title: Eugene_1
author: Eugene_1
content: Hello everyonedid you know i took part in the unibot in early stages and guess what i have earned a really good profitNow a days bot projects are really trending and people took impressive profits from them but obviously unibot took the first mover advantage on bots projectsBut now i found https://0xfutures.trade/ project they also coming with a unique idea of spot trading and future trading with 5x leverage and i am sure they provide the huge profit like unibot what you guys thinkplease share your opinion.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Quote from: Eugene_1 on October 04, 2023, 09:46:42 AM[...] please share your opinion.Lacking in reputation, a website that's only a day old raises suspicions, offering no convincing evidence and carrying a 99% potential for being a scam. Frankly, I find it hard to place trust in such new websites due to their absence of reputation and genuine member testimonials.When it comes to Telegram bots and making money, I haven't come across a method like that so far, unless one utilizes bots with more rational functions. It sounds like an easy-money bot, doesn't it? Therefore, my advice is to exercise caution. There's a multitude of scam models out there nowadays, and they come in various forms.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Eugene_1 on October 04, 2023, 09:46:42 AMHello everyonedid you know i took part in the unibot in early stages and guess what i have earned a really good profitNow a days bot projects are really trending and people took impressive profits from them but obviously unibot took the first mover advantage on bots projectsBut now i found https://0xfutures.trade/ project they also coming with a unique idea of spot trading and future trading with 5x leverage and i am sure they provide the huge profit like unibot what you guys thinkplease share your opinion.A brand new account that shills another bot-based platform, this is another bubble bot platform that spammed this section to entice members to invest, they did a rug pull already so members should take it as a warning to watch out of the bot-based token you're investing, pump and dump platforms do shill marketing.Op claimed that he made a profit that's because he was part of the team now they have a new pump and dump platform, as long as people support this pump and dump scheme they will continue to scam people.I expect to see more of this project, this is the start of their shill marketing.
